api/endpoints.title: API Endpoints
api/endpoints.description: Hoikka uses a mix of API routes for AJAX operations and form actions for mutations.

api/form-actions.title: Form Actions
api/form-actions.description: Most admin operations use SvelteKit form actions with progressive enhancement.

core/architecture.title: Architecture
core/architecture.description: Hoikka follows a service-oriented architecture with clear separation of concerns.

core/database.title: Database
core/database.description: Hoikka uses PostgreSQL with Drizzle ORM. Schema is defined in TypeScript.

core/providers.title: Providers
core/providers.description: Hoikka uses a provider pattern for payments and shipping, making it easy to add new integrations.

core/services.title: Services
core/services.description: All business logic lives in src/lib/server/services/. Each service is a singleton class.

features/cart.title: Cart
features/cart.description: Hoikka uses cookie-based cart tokens for guest-friendly shopping.

features/collections.title: Collections
features/collections.description: Collections group products for navigation and merchandising. They can be manual or rule-based (smart collections).

features/orders.title: Orders
features/orders.description: Orders track customer purchases through their lifecycle.

features/payments.title: Payments
features/payments.description: Hoikka uses a provider pattern for payments, with Stripe as the default.

features/products.title: Products
features/products.description: Products in Hoikka support variants, translations, and facets (attributes).

features/shipping.title: Shipping
features/shipping.description: Hoikka supports multiple shipping providers with a unified interface.

getting-started/configuration.title: Configuration
getting-started/configuration.description: Hoikka uses environment variables for configuration. No XML, YAML, or admin panels needed.

integrations/erp-example.title: ERP Integration Example
integrations/erp-example.description: Complete example showing how to integrate an external ERP system.

integrations/events.title: Events
integrations/events.description: Two modes of operation: in-memory (immediate) or persistent (via job queue).

integrations/job-queue.title: Job Queue
integrations/job-queue.description: PostgreSQL-backed job queue with automatic retry and exponential backoff.

integrations/overview.title: Integrations Overview
integrations/overview.description: Hoikka includes PostgreSQL-native utilities for integrating external systems (ERP, PIM, etc.) without Redis or other external dependencies.

integrations/sync-runner.title: Sync Runner
integrations/sync-runner.description: Reusable pattern for synchronizing data from external systems (ERP, PIM, etc.).

integrations/webhooks.title: Webhooks
integrations/webhooks.description: Handle incoming webhooks from external systems with signature verification.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Hoikka is a lightweight e-commerce platform for SvelteKit that is 100% customizable and owned by you.
